translation.Name: Rio Computer - ZKA #1
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_3: The Z.K.A. (Zombie. Kill. Agent.) has taken effect on zombies, but not as we desired it to. It's been killing zombies instead of curing them. It's not a cure to the virus, but it will surely help for future supply raids. It seems to only harm zombies for the most part, although if someone is almost a zombie, their infected tissue will die and stay on their bodies. This could potentially do more harm than help in the wrong hands.
